reviews:
If you're looking for cool, soft, stretchy, super comfortable socks, look no further! I got the gray ones (they were cheaper than blk which I really wanted) but these are practically black anyway. Perfect for under office pants. Yes, they have a slight seam on top of the foot. Doesn't bother me. The foot is cushioned, but not super thick. I'm thinking these will last longer because of the cushioning and will not show holes under the ball of my feet. The length goes up past my ankle but nothing like crew socks would. My feet always get quite hot, but with these socks my feet can breathe.
They look small when you unwrap them, but they're quite stretchy. I'd advise hanging them to dry. Avoid the dryer on these.
My feet are delighted, and I would highly recommend!
product_name: +MD 6 Pack Womens and Mens Odor Control Rayon from Bamboo Ankle Socks Cushioned Sole Quarter Casual Socks

review_title: seem a tad small. but comfy. they do ...
reviews:
seem a tad small. but comfy. they do however in my experience so far (a few days and 4 pair) fray after first use. I dont feel as if they will be a lasting sock.

*update. 2 washes (on a gentle cycle in a modern washing machine ) and now word 3 days. these socks are falling apart. I bought these socks for hiking, but have only worn them around the house for limited amounts of time. I would not buy these again
product_name: +MD 6 Pack Womens and Mens Odor Control Rayon from Bamboo Ankle Socks Cushioned Sole Quarter Casual Socks

reviews: I never knew how much of a difference socks could make when wearing certain shoes until now! I was getting blisters on my ankles from a new pair of leather boots that I purchased, and I thought it was just my feet until I heard that socks make a difference in how your shoes fit. So I did my research, and felt these ones were the best option... and OH MAN I AM SO GLAD I WENT WITH THESE! They are so comfortable and my boots fit perfectly- they are so much easier to walk in all day rather than a few hours. I cannot confirm their durability over time as I just got my pair today, but they are really great so far & I am so happy! I would definitely recommend buying these if you are looking to make your shoes fit more comfortably without the aches, pains, and potential blisters. The sizing fit perfectly also, I just followed the size chart that they have when you add the item to your cart.
product_name: +MD 6 Pack Womens and Mens Odor Control Rayon from Bamboo Ankle Socks Cushioned Sole Quarter Casual Socks

product_name: +MD 6 Pack Womens and Mens Odor Control Rayon from Bamboo Ankle Socks Cushioned Sole Quarter Casual Socks

reviews: I bought these for our long walks and the cushioning makes them really comfortable - so much so that I've bought +MD socks several times in order that I don't run out before the next wash. I just wish however that +MD would make muted coloured socks, like sage, and taupe, or pastel coloured socks to go with my pants and shoes. They just added a line of neon coloured socks, but I cannot wear them with anything I own - so please +MD, add soft colours to your mix.

reviews:
I bought a pack of 6 June of 2018.
I have a total of 14 pair of socks (different types) that I cycle through. Two to three pair of the original six I bought will need to be replaced in the next month or two.
I will probably buy again as they are very comfortable. Good for all year round. Wick mosture very well.

As others have said, they are small after washing. They look like kids socks, though they do stretch with out straining the fabrics or stitches. I'm size 10 1/2 wide and ordered the 9-11. I have not had an issue with fit.
If you have pets (we have a few cats) the socks do get linty and fur sticks to them, but they do wash well.
Price point could be a bit better. I paid a few dollars less last year.
product_name: +MD 6 Pack Womens and Mens Odor Control Rayon from Bamboo Ankle Socks Cushioned Sole Quarter Casual Socks

review_title: I’d buy more! Great socks and so comfy!
reviews: Was always looking for socks that are comfortable and won’t slide when wearing high tops. These are the best! I can totally see myself buying more. Comfy and cozy for my feet. Soft too.
product_name: +MD 6 Pack Womens and Mens Odor Control Rayon from Bamboo Ankle Socks Cushioned Sole Quarter Casual Socks

review_title: Stay in place and don’t overheat
reviews: I love these socks. They are a bit thinner than the look in the picture, which was good for me. I’m a hot temperature person, these socks don’t cause me to over heat feet aleays dry. Nice snd soft. No indents on my feet or ankles after wearing. Another thing I really like is that these socks don’t twist on my feet, which I find other ankle socks usually do. They wash up nicely, I have only ever hang dry them so don’t know how they hold up in dryer. I will definitely purchase again as I tend to wear these instead of all my other socks
product_name: +MD 6 Pack Womens and Mens Odor Control Rayon from Bamboo Ankle Socks Cushioned Sole Quarter Casual Socks
